GLOW_DESCRIPTION: Give your card nice background glow
WRONG_USAGE: {{author}} Sad but you need to provide the card code `[glow [cardcode] [glowcode]]`
WRONG_CARD: Relax! What's with changing glows of other cards?
CARD_NOT_FOUND: Can't find your last card or try providing a card code
NO_GIF_CARDS: {{author}} glows cannot be applied on gif cards
GLOW_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} couldn't find that glow in your palette. Is the code correct?
